programme.desc: A giant robot falls to Earth and frightens a small town until it befriends nine year old Hogarth and ultimately finds its humanity by saving people from their own fears(n)

programme.desc: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom she's falling(n)

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: Based on a popular U.S. children's action show, this chopsocky sci-fi fantasy tells the tale of six courageous teenagers. Though they appear perfectly normal, they are in reality superheroes who are experts in karate. When a slimy villain attempts to take over the world, the kids must stop him(n)

programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily(n)

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: A giant robot falls to Earth and frightens a small town until it befriends nine year old Hogarth and ultimately finds its humanity by saving people from their own fears(n)

programme.title: Babe Ruth
programme.desc: A profile of the baseball legend includes film clips and interviews with former teammates, broadcasters and Ruth's adopted daughter, Julia Ruth Stevens. Also: Pulitzer Prize-winning photographer Nat Fein. Narrated by Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The adorable Pied Pipers of diapers return in this cartoon charmer, which finds the toddlers frolicking in Paris. But the gang gets into a pickle when a wicked theme-park executive schemes to marry Chuckie's widowed dad for her own selfish gain(n)

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Alvin, Simon, and Theodore are back in director Tim Hill's computer-animation/live-action hybrid following the further adventures of the world's most adorable singing trio. Songwriter Dave Seville (Jason Lee) has been struggling to gain recognition in the music industry for some time, and despite the fact that his former college roommate (David Cross) is now a high-profile powerbroker at Jett Records, Dave still can't manage to get a break. Things soon start to look up, however, when Dave discovers three singing chipmunks hiding out in the branches of a Christmas tree in Jett Records' world headquarters. Realizing that these woodland crooners cold prove to be his ticket to the big time, Dave does his best to transform Alvin (Justin Long), Simon (Matthew Gray Gubler), and Theodore (Jesse McCartney) into the next great pop sensation. As adorable and talented as they may be, though, these bouncy little critters aren't quite domesticated just yet; they still have a wild streak in them a mile wide, and it isn't long before Dave's life, home, and career are in utter chaos. But staying mad at such lovable little creatures is next to impossible, no matter what kind of mischief they might get into(n)

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. When a German holidaymaker begs the travellers to help find his brother, who went missing exploring an ancient Mayan temple, the group agrees to offer their assistance. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: Inspirational true story of the residents of Huntington, West Virginia who rebuilt their football team after the tragic deaths of the original squad in a plane crash

programme.title: Black Sea
programme.desc: A rogue submarine captain accepts a potentially lucrative offer to seek out a missing treasure in the Black Sea despite the sneaking suspicion that he may be double crossed in this sea adventure starring Jude Law and Scoot McNairy, and directed by Kevin Macdonald

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: This gritty, highly intense fact-based crime drama tells the sordid tale of a group of drug dealers who kidnap the teenage brother (Anton Yelchin) of a client (Ben Foster) who owes them money and refuses to pay. At first the hostage is treated like their guest, but soon things spiral out of control and a pivotal decision about his fate must be reached. The outstanding young cast is led by Justin Timberlake, Emile Hirsch and Shawn Hatosy. Bruce Willis and Sharon Stone are also featured

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: Hard-hitting action with Patrick Swayze as a Zen martial arts expert hired by a small-town bar to clean up the clientele and eject the trouble-makers who are plaguing the establishment

programme.title: Face Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean agrees to have the face of terrorist Castor grafted on so that he can foil a bomb plot. But when Castor wakes up from his coma, he forces doctors to graft Sean's face onto his, sparking a deadly game of cat and mouse

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teenage girl to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: "Say hello to my little friend." The drug-crazed, bloodshot performance by Al Pacino is the rock at the heart of this extreme and controversial film penned by Oliver Stone

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: Aspiring EDM musician Cole works to hone his craft, and is taken under the wing of a jaded, successful DJ named James. However, the friendship between the two men sours when Cole begins to fall for James' beautiful girlfriend(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women in this sexy sequel(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: The cops have caught up with crook Ed Norton, but he still has 24 hours of freedom before going to jail. Powerful drama from Spike Lee. With Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Jonas Brothers: The Concert Experience
programme.desc: The Jonas Brothers burn up the big screen in this 3-D rockumentary chronicling their "Burning Up" concert tour. The film features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, a brand-new song, and special guest performances by Taylor Swift and Demi Lovato. Directed by Bruce Hendricks ("Hannah Montana/Miley Cyrus: Best of Both Worlds Concert")(n)

programme.title: Street Kings
programme.desc: Tom Ludlow is a veteran LAPD cop who finds life difficult to navigate after the death of his wife. When evidence implicates him in the execution of a fellow officer, he is forced to go up against the cop culture he's been a part of his entire career, ultimately leading him to question the loyalties of everyone around him(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Everest'
programme.desc: A look at "Everest," a 2016 drama based on the attempts by two groups to climb Mount Everest in 1996. The film stars Jason Clarke, Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin and Robin Wright, and is directed by Baltasar Kormákur(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent(n)

programme.title: Stargate: The Ark of Truth
programme.desc: This exciting feature-length film picks up where the "Stargate SG-1" series left off, chronicling the adventures of the crew as they search for an ancient artifact that will enable them to defeat their enemies, the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, Christopher Judge, Claudia Black, Beau Bridges. Written and directed by Robert C. Cooper(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: In this thrilling fourth installment of the "Jurassic Park" franchise, two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day(n)

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: A hunt for treasure leads two firefighters (Bill Paxton, William Sadler) to a burned-out urban fortress in Illinois. James: Ice-T. Savon: Ice Cube. Bradlee: Art Evans. Lucky: DeVoreaux White. Raymond: Bruce A. Young. Luther: Glenn Plummer. Directed by Walter Hill(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn(n)

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: In this utterly unique comedy, a bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent goes undercover and infiltrates a group of extreme athletes in order to prove they are using their specialised skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. The film is inspired by the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne searches for his own identity after a bout of amnesia, leading him on a globe-trekking trip in which he must avoid the zinging bullets of cops and assassins who are out to stop him before he uncovers the truth(n)

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: In the late 80's, the wrestler Randy Robinson is at the peak of his career. Twenty years later, his stardom is nothing but a memory, but his passion for the sport keeps him going

programme.title: Horsemen of the Apocalypse
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid stars in this thriller about a hardened, recently widowed cop who makes a shocking discovery while investigating serial killings rooted in the biblical prophecy of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse

programme.title: Making of 'Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials'
programme.desc: A look at "Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials," the 2015 sequel to "The Maze Runner" (2014) in which Thomas, Teresa, and the rest of the Gladers prepare for phase two of their trials after narrowly escaping the first test. The film stars Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, and is directed by Wes Ball

programme.title: The Great Outdoors
programme.desc: Comedy in which a quiet family holiday by the lake is interrupted when the wife's obnoxious salesman brother, his chain-smoking wife and their loathsome twin daughters appear on the cabin doorstep expecting to share the vacation

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Johnny, who has just been released from prison and gets a job in a café beside waitress Frankie. Frankie is a loner but Johnny is determined that their romance will blossom

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack is in a groove as the owner of a Chicago used-record store in this smart 2000 romantic comedy. It's the story of a man who reflects on his messy love life while paying meticulous attention to all things vinyl. The charmer is based on the novel by Nick Hornby. Iben Hjejle, Jack Black, Todd Louiso, Joan Cusack, Tim Robbins, Lisa Bonet

programme.title: MI-5
programme.desc: When head of counter-terrorism, Harry Pearce, goes missing, his apprentice Will Holloway sets off to find out what happened. With an impending attack on London looming and Holloway discovering a conspiracy running from Vietnam to the Mediterranean, he is on a race with time and must solve the case before it's too late

programme.title: Hollywoodland
programme.desc: Stylish 50s-set drama about a private eye investigating one of the entertainment industry's most enduring mysteries, the apparent suicide of Superman star George Reeves. However, his enquiries lead him deep into Hollywood's seedy underbelly, uncovering a love triangle involving a former showgirl and a powerful studio executive

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Morgan Freeman are perfectly matched in this riotous road movie about two terminally ill cancer patients, a tycoon (Nicholson) and a mechanic (Freeman), who embark on a things-to-do-before-we-kick-the-bucket adventure that has them living it up all over the world. Directed by Rob Reiner. TV game-show host Alex Trebek has a cameo as himself, and Alfonso Freeman, Morgan's real-life son, costars as his movie son(r)

programme.title: Eulogy
programme.desc: Writer/director Michael Clancy makes his feature film debut with the black comedy Eulogy. Zooey Deschanel plays Kate Collins, an unhappy college student who is made even more unhappy when her grandfather (Rip Torn) dies. Even though the entire family hates each other, they reunite at the home of Grandma Collins (Piper Laurie). Among other family members, Kate observes a war between her washed-up actor dad, Daniel (Hank Azaria); her lesbian Aunt Lucy (Kelly Preston); her wound-up Uncle Skip (Ray Romano); and her strict Aunt Alice (Debra Winger). Tensions escalate and family secrets are ultimately revealed. Kate is also inundated with the eulogy-writing duties, as she's the only one capable of such a task. Meanwhile, she reunites with old flame Ryan Carmichael (Jesse Bradford). Eulogy premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in 2004(r)

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: James Marsh's biopic of the celebrated scientist Stephen Hawking, The Theory of Everything, stars Eddie Redmayne as the famous figure. Enrolled as a graduate student at Cambridge, Hawking establishes himself as one of the leading minds of his generation, and begins to win the heart of Jane (Felicity Jones). After one of his earliest breakthroughs, Hawking is diagnosed with ALS, and he becomes less and less able to control his own body. With the loyal Jane at his side, he continues his work. However, as the years progress, Jane starts to feel more like a nurse than a wife, and Hawking begins to have feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him. The Theory of Everything screened at the 2014 Toronto International Film Festival(r)

programme.title: Hollywoodland
programme.desc: Stylish 50s-set drama about a private eye investigating one of the entertainment industry's most enduring mysteries, the apparent suicide of Superman star George Reeves. However, his enquiries lead him deep into Hollywood's seedy underbelly, uncovering a love triangle involving a former showgirl and a powerful studio executive

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as maths genius John Nash, who finds that paranoia and schizophrenia are problems he may never solve. Acclaimed drama. Mature themes/flashing images. (2001)(136 mins)

programme.title: Maps to the Stars
programme.desc: A high-powered Hollywood family unravel after their troubled daughter returns home, years after causing a fire that nearly killed her brother. Meanwhile, the daughter develops a relationship with a limo driver, and an aging actress pines for a role that she was born to play(n)

programme.title: Naked Lunch
programme.desc: David Cronenberg's bizarre and disturbing drama is based on William Burroughs' equally strange novel, with some outrageous sequences involving William Lee, an ex-drug addict who now makes a living from exterminating cockroaches. Suddenly, without warning, he is sucked into a seedy underworld inhabited by drug-taking spies, talking typewriter insects and sexually threatening Mugwumps, strange creatures from a place called Interzone(n)

programme.title: Orphans of Ebola
programme.desc: The life of a 12-year-old boy in Sierra Leone is upended when eight family members die during the Ebola outbreak of 2013-16(n)

programme.title: Other People's Money
programme.desc: Corporate raider Larry 'The Liquidator' Garfield sees easy pickings in the cable company of stolid old Andrew Jorgenson. But the veteran and his wife won't go down without a fight, particularly with help from his lawyer daughter Kate. Will Larry's lust overcome his greed?(n)

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: Drew Barrymore plays a teenage single mother who tries to overcome the feeling she's made the wrong choices in life(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Feelgood tennis romance from the makers of Notting Hill. Low-ranking British pro Peter is inspired to greatness in his last Wimbledon tournament when he starts dating American golden girl Lizzie. But while their love match spurs him on, her game falls apart..(n)

programme.title: Meet the Donors: Does Money Talk?
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi looks at money in politics and interviews wealthy donors to Republican and Democratic parties to ask them about their contributions and philosophies. Also: a look at efforts to enact campaign-finance reform(n)

programme.title: No Reservations
programme.desc: Top New York chef Kate has her well-ordered world turned upside-down by the arrival of her orphaned niece at home and a handsome new workmate in the kitchen(n)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A murdered New York banker returns to protect his girlfriend, with help from a psychic(n)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: The arrival of alien spacecraft heralds a mighty invasion, but the Earth fights back: a fighter pilot, a boffin and the US President team up to foil the intergalactic plan(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Everybody Knows. Andre's surprise visit to the office sends Spencer scrambling to stay one step ahead of his rival. Meanwhile, Joe learns some unsavory secrets about his partner; Ricky tries to make up with his dad; and Charles schemes to keep a friend nearby(n)

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women in this sexy sequel(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Segments include a report on the challenges faced by female sports reporters; a visit with adopted sisters and Paralympians Hannah and Tatyana McFadden; and another visit with Cancellor Lee Adams, the unwanted son of former wideout Rae Carruth, who is in prison for masterminding the murder of Adams' mother(n)

programme.title: The Night Of *
programme.desc: Stone se encuentra, de repente, en el epicentro de atención, después de una controversial defensa que ejerce su astuto abogado en los estrados. Cuando la tensión va creciendo, el juicio de Naz alcanza su punto más álgido, en una jornada donde podría quedar todo definido. O casi todo. Hay mucho en juego. (cc)

programme.title: Ballers *
programme.desc: En el codiciado mundo del fútbol americano todos los movimientos deben ser estudiados con precisión, para no dar ni un paso en falso. La visita sorpresa de Andre a la oficina obliga a Spencer a mantenerse un escalón por delante de su rival. Joe, por su parte, descubre algunos secretos para nada agradables sobre su compañero, mientras que Ricky trata de recomponer la relación con su padre y Charles no quiere perder a un amigo cercano. (cc)

programme.title: Vice Principals *
programme.desc: La doctora Belinda Brown se ve sorprendida y totalmente abrumada por la inesperada llegada de su exmarido, situación que la pone muy nerviosa, ya que no sabe cómo manejarse ante su repentina presencia. Por su parte, Gamby y Amanda comparten un extenuante día de trabajo en el profesorado, en tanto que Russell pone a prueba su paciencia. (cc)

programme.title: The NeverEnding Story
programme.desc: Efectos especiales y acción se mezclan en esta historia dentro de la historia de un niño con la responsabilidad de salvar a una tierra fantástica en peligro

programme.title: Ice Princess
programme.desc: Una estudiante de secundaria quiere convertirse en una campeona de patinaje en hielo pero su madre quiere que vaya a Harvard

programme.title: The Luzhin Defence
programme.desc: El romance inusual e imprevisible entre un talentoso jugador de ajedrez y la hija de una aristócrata. John Turturro, Emily Watson, Geraldine James, Stuart Wilson

programme.title: A Girl in the River The Price of Forgiveness
programme.desc: Más de 1000 mujeres son asesinadas en nombre del "honor" en Pakistán cada año. Esta historia sigue la historia de un sobreviviente que se enamora y vive para contarlo. (cc)

programme.title: Godsend
programme.desc: Varios años después que el niño muerto de una pareja es clonado, el nuevo niño comienza a mostrar extraños y violentos comportamientos. Greg Kinnear, Robert De Niro, Rebecca Romijn-Stamos. Nick Hamm dirigió

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: En un pequeño pueblo de Maine, una profesora de matemáticas ayuda a un estudiante inteligente, cuya madre sufre de depresión. (cc)

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Christopher le sugiere terapias a su madre después de que ella y Henry tienen un incómodo episodio durante una cena con amigos. Más tarde, Olive visita a Christopher y a su segunda esposa en Nueva York, pero de repente vuelve a Maine. (cc)

programme.title: Real Sports with Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: Periodistas deportivos miran el lado serio de los deportes contemporáneos. (cc)

programme.title: Point Break (Sin límites)
programme.desc: Johnny Utah se une al FBI, dejando atrás su rebelde pasado. Cuando le asignan un caso en California, deberá arriesgar su vida a cada instante infiltrándose en un grupo de atletas de élite que se dedican al surf, liderados por el carismático Bodhi, para demostrar que son culpables de una cadena inconcebible de crímenes. (cc)

programme.title: Francisco, recen por mi
programme.desc: La vida del Padre Jorge Mario Bergoglio, hoy Papa Francisco, vista en una retrospectiva vívida y emocionante, acompañándolo por los barrios de Buenos Aires donde luchó por años para que la dignidad de los hombres, mujeres y niños jamás claudicara frente a la pobreza, la prostitución y la explotación laboral. De cerca, una periodista española sigue sus pasos, después de conocerlo en el cónclave de 2005, sin saber que ese arzobispo se convertiría en cabeza de la Iglesia(n)

programme.title: Los Contreras familia
programme.desc: Una familia disfuncional cuyos miembros son criminales. Ocultan la evidencia de sus crímenes cuando se dan cuenta de que la policía los espera fuera de su casa. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sr. Ávila *
programme.desc: El señor Ávila goza de un buen pasar con el dinero que le deja su funeraria, pero disfruta más de su poder como asesino a sueldo, lo que lo convirtió en una persona temible y muy respetada. Pero ahora, él sube la apuesta entre los mafiosos más oscuros de la ciudad y se transforma en un verdadero "Señor de señores", lo que lo coloca en un escalón por encima del resto(n)

programme.title: Chumel con Chumel Torres *
programme.desc: Juan Manuel Chumel Torres traspasó las fronteras de las redes sociales para llegar, sin escalas, a la masiva pantalla chica. En su programa, interpreta como nadie la realidad y permite el debate, la opinión y el análisis. En esta nueva entrega, demuestra una vez más que su ciclo no se trata de un mero y aburrido noticiero, como puede serlo un telediario regular, sino que es un verdadero talk-show, muy distinto a todos los demás. (cc)(n)

programme.title: El negocio
programme.desc: Karin, Luna, Magali y Ariel reabren el Club, pero el negocio va de mal en peor. Para atraer clientes al club, Karin planea una osada estrategia de mercadeo. Luna busca acercarse a Oscar, quien está concentrado en hacerse rico. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hard Knocks Training Camp With Los Angeles Rams
programme.desc: Detrás de los flashes y las transmisiones televisivas que rompen todos los récords de audiencia, existe una gran cantidad de jugadores de la NFL que son seres humanos y que tienen una vida como el resto de los mortales. Ellos, al igual que los entrenadores, tienen familia y deben recorrer, primero como novatos, un arduo camino para llegar a lo más alto en el fútbol americano de los Estados Unidos. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Anina
programme.desc: Un viaje fantástico al mundo de una niña de 10 años que después de un enfrentamiento en su escuela, recibe el castigo más raro en la historia, pero éste le deja grandes enseñanzas(n)

programme.title: Unaccompanied Minors
programme.desc: Cinco niños que viajan sin sus padres se enloquecen cuando una tormenta los obliga a pasar la Navidad en un aeropuerto lejos de casa. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks 2 Destination London
programme.desc: En Inglaterra, el superespía adolescente (Frankie Muniz) se hace pasar por un prodigio musical para truncar los planes de un agente renegado de dominar al mundo con un dispositivo que controla las mentes de las personas(n)

programme.title: Top Ten Monks
programme.desc: Un vistazo a los monjes cistercienses en su monasterio del siglo 12 localizado al sur de Viena, y quienes se convirtieron en una sensación mundial después del lanzamiento de su disco de cantos gregorianos en el 2008. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Secuencia en la que un inteligente estafador y sus hombres planean robar al dueño de casinos, el cual traicionó al mentor del estafador. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Refugiado
programme.desc: Laura y su pequeño Matías sufren cada día el infierno de los malos tratos en su propio hogar por parte de Fabián, su marido. Laura decidirá armarse de valor y hacerle frente a sus miedos. La nueva vida que se gesta en su interior y su hijo Matías merecen ser felices(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Ganadora de cuatro premios Oscar, incluyendo Mejor Fotografía y Director, esta película narra la historia del brillante matemático ganador del Premio Nobel John Nash(n)

programme.title: Destino Deporte
programme.desc: En este episodio se exploran los Juegos Mundiales de 2013. Además: una entrevista con el jugador de baloncesto, Oscar Schmidt; y se le da una mirada a la preparación que tuvo Argentina para la Copa Mundial de 1986(n)

programme.title: Quédate
programme.desc: Un obrero y el transportador de inmigrantes ilegales ayuda a un refugiado centro americano y a su hijo, hasta que el secreto sale a la luz (cc)(n)

programme.title: Refugiado
programme.desc: Laura y su pequeño Matías sufren cada día el infierno de los malos tratos en su propio hogar por parte de Fabián, su marido. Laura decidirá armarse de valor y hacerle frente a sus miedos. La nueva vida que se gesta en su interior y su hijo Matías merecen ser felices(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner stars as a journalist who is tormented by a vicious smear campaign after he exposes a CIA scandal. Absorbing biographical drama with Rosemarie DeWitt. (2014)(108 mins)

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Sylvester Stallone as an explosives expert who becomes involved in one woman's obsessive desire for vengeance. Ray Quick is hired by May Munro (Sharon Stone) to kill the people who murdered her parents when she was a child. However, Ray soon discovers that May is not quite all that she seems and that a shadow from his own past has returned to haunt him

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote farm in Pennsylvania

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: An elite group of FBI agents clash with local authorities in Saudi Arabia while investigating a terrorist bombing of a Western housing compound. Jamie Foxx, Chris Cooper and Jennifer Garner star in this action-packed political thriller. Jason Bateman, Ashraf Barhom, Ali Suliman, Jeremy Piven. Directed by Peter Berg

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: A CIA agent who is currently in the process of writing a book loses the disc containing his only manuscript in this comedic tale of espionage that reunites filmmaking duo Joel and Ethan Coen with Intolerable Cruelty and O Brother, Where Art Thou? star George Clooney

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: The Dark Knight must face two new supervillians, Mr Freeze and Poison Ivy. But there are problems back at Wayne Manor as the redoubtable Alfred is sick, Robin is acting up and the newly arrived Batgirl wants to join the gang

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: Quirky Coen brothers effort follows Depression-era convicts who escape a Mississippi chain gang and embark on an odyssey to find a hidden treasure. The film is rife with references to Homer's "Odyssey"

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: Romantic drama about Sabine de Barra, a gifted gardener and landscaper who is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping to be constructed at the palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: A husband becomes a suspect in his wife's disappearance after she vanishes on their fifth wedding anniversary

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. But once in court, Crawford, representing himself, starts to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him... Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw(n)

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A wealthy tycoon, who masterminds bank heists for the thrill of the chase, becomes romantically involved with a beautiful insurance investigator; unfortunately for him, she's got a hidden agenda of her own... putting him behind bars(n)

programme.title: House
programme.desc: Director Robby Henson's psychological thriller House concerns a husband and wife who, attempting to patch up their marriage after the death of their child, decide on a spur of the moment to ignore their regularly scheduled therapy session and set off on a trip. After a car accident incapacitates their vehicle, the duo ends up at the title dwelling, where they meet another couple as well as the off-putting people who own the establishment. Soon, the two couples realize they must rely on each other in order to survive(n)

programme.title: King Ralph
programme.desc: Comedy starring John Goodman as the eponymous Ralph, a Las Vegas entertainer who is launched into international fame when it is discovered that he is the only living heir to the British throne! After the entire Royal Family is killed in a freak accident, the loveable Las Vegas slob must quickly learn the airs and graces expected of a blue-blooded monarch(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Broncos
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite director Jared Hess again turns his attention to the theme of the lonely, awkward teenager in this comedy about sci-fi fan Benjamin. Desperately wanting to be a writer, Benjamin asks his favourite author, Dr Ronald Chevalier, for feedback on his work-in-progress manuscript Yeast Lords: The Bronco Years. However, suffering from a severe case of writer's block, Chevalier passes off the novel as his own, starting a chain of events that sets Benjamin out on a mission to prove that the work is his(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Loved-up newlyweds, Sarah and Tom, experience the honeymoon from hell when her disapproving family dispatch Sarah's ex-boyfriend to undo the marital knot(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Sick of being bullied by her overpowering Greek family, dowdy Toula signs up for college. Despite every warning, Toula falls for a non-Greek guy, and it's not easy getting her clan to accept him. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: A mysterious being is found in the pool of an apartment complex. She clearly comes from another world, and it seems she may not be alone. Now the neighbors will have to save her if they are to save themselves from whatever is after her. M. Night Shyamalan works his Academy Award-nominated, spellbinding craftsmanship into an unexpected story that features mesmerizing images, not to mention a breathtaking cast: Bryce Dallas Howard, Paul Giamatti, Jeffrey Wright and Sarita Choudhury(n)

programme.title: Consenting Adults
programme.desc: A man is arrested on suspicion of murder after succumbing to his neighbour's desire for a wife-swapping session. A suburban couple's lifestyle is enlivened with the arrival of new neighbours, and before long the husband is talked into a wife-swapping deal. But the next morning his 'new partner' is found bludgeoned to death - and he finds himself arrested on a murder charge(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), known only by the barcode tattoo on his neck, is an elite international assassin. Engineered to be an unstoppable killing machine, 47 is contracted by a covert organization to assassinate high-profile targets on a global scale. He's given the assignment to kill the leader of a crime syndicate who wishes to unlock the secrets behind 47's powers and harness that information into an army of highly skilled hit men. programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally. (cc)
